text: Western blot analysis was performed as described previously [32] . The membranes were incubated with anti-human PKR monoclonal antibody (BD Biosciences), anti-mouse PKR monoclonal antibody (B-10, Santa Cruz, CA), anti-RVFV mouse polyclonal antibody (a kind gift from Dr. R.B.Tesh, UTMB), anti-Flag-tag M2 monoclonal antibody (Sigma), or anti-b-actin goat polyclonal antibody (I-19; Santa Cruz, CA.) overnight at 4uC and with secondary antibodies (Santa Cruz, CA) for 1 hr at room temperature.
